root.message: The DOC_METHOD field for indicator 5-5-1a, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Guidance is not required to provide information for this indicator (i.e. current number of members and total number of women members in a given single or lower chamber of a national parliament).

A “Checklist for Parline Correspondents” is provided to remind parliaments to inform the IPU of changes to the number of seats or the total number of women in a parliamentary chamber, every time there is a change.
